turns.content: These reviews are for a 4-slice toaster on Amazon. Most of the reviewers were not satisfied with their purchase. The first reviewer said that the toaster does not toast evenly and that her bread slices are too large for the toaster. Another reviewer said that the top of the bread does not get toasted as much as the rest of the slice. A third reviewer mentioned that the toaster is quite big and lightweight, with a short cord, and that the eject function is jarring and loud. However, the same reviewer liked the wide slots and the ability to cook four slices at once. The last reviewer also mentioned that the top of the bread does not get toasted, and that the clean-out tray does not catch all the crumbs. Overall, the reviewers found the toaster unsatisfactory and would not recommend it.
put the review comments into bullet points

Sure, here are the bullet points summarizing the review comments:

Linzi Schwartz's review:

* Likes the sleek design of the toaster
* Toasts unevenly, some spots nearly burnt while others are barely toasted
* Cannot accommodate four slices if bread has larger slices than the average loaf
* No bagel feature, which was not noticed during purchase
* Digital settings have no in-between options
* Going to donate and purchase a different brand

Edward Farrey's review:

* Does not toast bread near the top of the slice as much as the remainder
* Digital controls are neat but require babysitting the toast
* Dial-type controller on old style toasters allows for easier time adjustment
* Looks nice and easy to operate
* Disappointed that companies cannot make a good toaster

Kindle Customer's review:

* Large and lightweight/flimsy, dimensions should be measured before purchase
* Toaster gets very hot, including the sides
* Cord is not very long
* Eject is loud and jarring, may startle animals or people
* Would not necessarily recommend but will keep it
* Likes the ability to toast 2 long slices or 4 English muffins at a time

Tim S.'s review:

* Likes the wide slots and ability to cook four slices at once
* Timing function is nice for meal preparation
* Bread does not get toasted evenly, top of bread does not get toasted
* Toasting requires turning bread over and toasting longer
* Clean-out tray at the bottom has little to nothing in it, but toaster spews crumbs and seeds all over the counter
* Cons outweigh the pros in their opinion
